r.s: Manage and handles color data and conversions.
r.d: Manage and handles color data and conversions.
r.n: Bug #5828 - 'gd' PHP extension is not installed Bug #11795 - Unit Tests will not work without deprecated phpunit Bug #14460 - Reference to $this in static function Bug #14887 - E_NOTICE when setColors() and changeLightness() called
